page.title: 18EID DAY 1985 BLACKBURN
page.content:
I couldn't sleep on Wednesday night.I was so excited about Eid the next day. My mum woke me early, I washed and got dressed in my new clothes. On Eid we have a special kind of warm milk with Almonds and other crushed nuts in it. At nine-o-clock we went to a special Eid Namaz. A Namaz is when we go to the Mosque and pray with a man who speaks in Arabic, he uses a microphone. The Namaz usually lasts about one hour.
During Eid we greet people and shake hands, we say EID MUBARAK.We also give money to each other and visit our friends homes.We offer food and drink. We also visit the graveyard to pray for people who are dead.We celebrate Eid because it is the end of the fast of Ramadan.We eat rice,on Eid,for our dinner. by Asian boy age 10.
